common_words.tu: second person singular subject pronoun (you familiar)
common_words.il: third person masculine singular subject pronoun (he/it)
common_words.elle: third person feminine singular subject pronoun (she/it)
common_words.ils: third person masculine plural subject pronoun (they)
common_words.elles: third person feminine plural subject pronoun (they)
common_words.me: first person singular direct/indirect object pronoun (me)
common_words.te: second person singular direct/indirect object pronoun (you)
common_words.le_pronoun: third person masculine singular direct object pronoun (him/it)
common_words.la_pronoun: third person feminine singular direct object pronoun (her/it)
common_words.les_pronoun: third person plural direct object pronoun (them)
common_words.lui: third person singular indirect object pronoun (to him/her/it)
common_words.leur: third person plural indirect object pronoun (to them)
common_words.nous_object: first person plural direct/indirect object pronoun (us)
common_words.vous_object: second person plural/formal direct/indirect object pronoun (you)

grammatical_particles.ne: negation particle used with pas, plus, jamais, etc.

verb_constructions.avoir_auxiliary: auxiliary verb for passé composé (to have)
verb_constructions.être_auxiliary: auxiliary verb for passé composé with movement/reflexive verbs (to be)
verb_constructions.aller_future: semi-auxiliary for near future (to be going to)
verb_constructions.venir_de: semi-auxiliary for recent past (to have just)
verb_constructions.être_en_train_de: periphrasis for ongoing action (to be in the process of)
verb_constructions.se_reflexive: reflexive pronoun for reflexive/middle voice verbs
verb_constructions.se_reciprocal: reflexive pronoun for reciprocal action (each other)
